android.car.input

接口 CarInputManager.CarInputCaptureCallback

  • 封闭类:
    CarInputManager

    public static interface CarInputManager.CarInputCaptureCallback
    Callback for capturing input events.

    Events (key, rotary and custom input events) are associated with display types. Display types are defined in CarOccupantZoneManager. This manager only accepts the driver display types (CarOccupantZoneManager.DISPLAY_TYPE_MAIN and CarOccupantZoneManager.DISPLAY_TYPE_INSTRUMENT_CLUSTER).

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void onCaptureStateChanged(int targetDisplayType, int[] activeInputTypes)
      Capture state for the display has changed due to other client making requests or releasing capture.
      default void onCustomInputEvents(int targetDisplayType, java.util.List<CustomInputEvent> events)
      Custom input events were captured.
      default void onKeyEvents(int targetDisplayType, java.util.List<KeyEvent> keyEvents)
      Key events were captured.
      default void onRotaryEvents(int targetDisplayType, java.util.List<RotaryEvent> events)
      Rotary events were captured.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onKeyEvents

        default void onKeyEvents(int targetDisplayType,
                         java.util.List<KeyEvent> keyEvents)
        Key events were captured.
        参数:
        targetDisplayType - the display type associated with the events passed as parameter
        keyEvents - the key events to process

      • onRotaryEvents

        default void onRotaryEvents(int targetDisplayType,
                            java.util.List<RotaryEvent> events)
        Rotary events were captured.
        参数:
        targetDisplayType - the display type associated with the events passed as parameter
        events - the rotary events to process

      • onCaptureStateChanged

        default void onCaptureStateChanged(int targetDisplayType,
                                   int[] activeInputTypes)
        Capture state for the display has changed due to other client making requests or releasing capture. Client should check activeInputTypes for which input types are currently captured.
        参数:
        targetDisplayType - the display type associated with the events passed as parameter
        activeInputTypes - the input types to watch

      • onCustomInputEvents

        default void onCustomInputEvents(int targetDisplayType,
                                 java.util.List<CustomInputEvent> events)
        Custom input events were captured.
        参数:
        targetDisplayType - the display type associated with the events passed as parameter
        events - the custom input events to process
